item.title: About
item.description: I am Aydin Mercan (/ˈaɪdɪn merdʒan/), a sophomore CEng student at TOBB ETU. I am interested in security, cryptography and hardware description but I aim to share knowledge I stumble on from a broad of topics includings interests such as mathematics. Gear Currently, I work on a Thinkpad E495 or my desktop. Those systems run Arch Linux since most sane distributions more or less work with similar toolchains.
